88786.text: Fix a bug where ExternalTrafficPolicy is not applied to service ExternalIPs.
88786.markdown: Fix a bug where ExternalTrafficPolicy is not applied to service ExternalIPs. ([#88786](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/88786), [@freehan](https://github.com/freehan)) [SIG Network]
88786.author: freehan

88915.text: Fixed a data race in kubelet image manager that can cause static pod workers to silently stop working.
88915.markdown: Fixed a data race in kubelet image manager that can cause static pod workers to silently stop working. ([#88915](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/88915), [@roycaihw](https://github.com/roycaihw)) [SIG Node]
88915.author: roycaihw

88934.text: kube-proxy: on dual-stack mode, if it is not able to get the IP Family of an endpoint, logs it with level InfoV(4) instead of Warning, avoiding flooding the logs for endpoints without addresses
88934.markdown: Kube-proxy: on dual-stack mode, if it is not able to get the IP Family of an endpoint, logs it with level InfoV(4) instead of Warning, avoiding flooding the logs for endpoints without addresses ([#88934](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/88934), [@aojea](https://github.com/aojea)) [SIG Network]
88934.author: aojea

89002.text: Fix invalid VMSS updates due to incorrect cache
89002.markdown: Fix invalid VMSS updates due to incorrect cache ([#89002](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89002), [@ArchangelSDY](https://github.com/ArchangelSDY)) [SIG Cloud Provider]
89002.author: ArchangelSDY

89055.text: Fixed an issue that could cause the kubelet to incorrectly run concurrent pod reconciliation loops and crash.
89055.markdown: Fixed an issue that could cause the kubelet to incorrectly run concurrent pod reconciliation loops and crash. ([#89055](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89055), [@tedyu](https://github.com/tedyu)) [SIG Node]
89055.author: tedyu

89056.text: EndpointSlice should not contain endpoints for terminating pods

89056.author: andrewsykim

89093.text: Removes ConfigMap as suggestion for IngressClass parameters

89093.author: robscott

89095.markdown: Update Cluster Autoscaler to 1.18.0; changelog: https://github.com/kubernetes/autoscaler/releases/tag/cluster-autoscaler-1.18.0 ([#89095](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89095), [@losipiuk](https://github.com/losipiuk)) [SIG Autoscaling and Cluster Lifecycle]

89138.text: Fix isCurrentInstance for Windows by removing the dependency of hostname.
89138.markdown: Fix isCurrentInstance for Windows by removing the dependency of hostname. ([#89138](https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/89138), [@feiskyer](https://github.com/feiskyer)) [SIG Cloud Provider]
